name: Useless Games Pack
description:
Hi! I'm brickslayr2! Thank you for visiting this crappy page!

First of all: 

This game sucks~It's a cash grab~There's only 4 games included~

Yeah. That's it. It's also controller compatible.

That's all. It sucks, yes, yes, I know, but it's a cash grab. Thank you for at least reading this!

(P.S. the second game in the pack is basically a clone but with a twist, sorry)

Have a great day!
